Title: The Rebuttal
Plot: Robert proves to the ethics committee that he would never take a mohair suit while Andy prepares to deliver a rebuttal after the State of the Union. Louis is put in the spotlight on his first day back when James mistakenly tweets a photo intended for Lola from the wrong account.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language, sexual references & content that may offend
Writer: Will Graham, Jared Gruszecki, Garry Trudeau
GuestStars: Yara Martinez, Cynthia Nixon, Amy Sedaris, Wanda Sykes, Julie White, Richard Cox, Haley Joel Osment, Alicia Sable, Brooke Bloom, Kobi Libii, Ben Rameaka, Willa Fitzgerald, Jonathan Fried, Kenneth Tigar, Joseph Del
